channel.title: Help Me! Connecting Error - Retrying in _
channel.description:
I have a problem... The problem is, i have a server. And i made a .RAR file from it, for the download. And my frend wants to join, so he downloaded the client. http://up.ht/niK2oR The download works, and he press Run and he gets the screen: [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy76/Alexie321/ErrorConnecting.png[/img]
Somebody want's to help me with my problem? Thanks allot if you help.
Contact me: Alexander-Staneke@hotmail.com

item.title: Help Me! Connecting Error - Retrying in _
item.dc:creator: @dillktm65 dillktm65
item.description:
@dillktm65 wrote:

I have edited this source I think or a similar one, if you edit the background different it will do this or any sprite.

What I mean by different is like bigger or smaller or a different type.

It could be a cache problem, where you need to add the cache into the client and tell them to extract it into there C:

Read full topic
item.source: Help Me! Connecting Error - Retrying in _

I have a problem…

And my frend wants to join, so he downloaded the client. http://up.ht/niK2oR
The download works, and he press Run and he gets the screen:
